Generate a 3D Model from a Text Prompt

game art for gamers who can't art ¯\(°_o)/¯

This neural network architecture was written by 2 independent researchers/gamedevs who suck at Blender. It's trained with publicly available 3D assets. Our free demo is for personal use only, we're working on paid version for commercial use.
